info.title: Microsoft Power Platform REST API - environmentmanagement
info.description: Unified API for all administrative capabilities in Microsoft Power Platform.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Payload for the environment management setting

get.summary: Get environment management setting by ID.

parameters.name: environmentId
parameters.description: ID for the environment management setting.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Number of records to retrieve. Defaults to 500 if not set.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: List of properties to select for this entity.

patch.summary: Update fields on the environment management setting.

parameters.name: environmentId
parameters.description: The ID for the environment management setting being updated.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Details on the environment management setting to be updated

CreateEnvironmentManagementSettingRespon.description: Represents the response object for APIs in this service.

objectResult.description: Gets or sets the ID of the entity being created in the response

nextLink.description: Gets or sets the next link if there are more records to be returned

responseMessage.description: Gets or sets the error message.

GetEnvironmentManagementSettingResponse.description: Represents the response object for APIs in this service.

objectResult.description: Gets or sets the fields for the entities being queried.

nextLink.description: Gets or sets the next link if there are more records to be returned

responseMessage.description: Gets or sets the error message.

OperationResponse.description: Represents the response object for APIs in this service.

objectResult.description: Gets or sets the response's object

nextLink.description: Gets or sets the next link if there are more records to be returned

debugErrors.description: Gets or sets debug errors, that are only shown for private/local testing

responseMessage.description: Gets or sets the error message.

id.description: The value of id property on the environment object.

displayName.description: The display name of the environment.

tenantId.description: The value of tenantId property on the environment object.

geo.description: The geographical region of the environment.

environmentGroupId.description: The ID of the environment group to which this environment belongs.

azureRegion.description: The Azure region of the environment.

createdDateTime.description: The creation date and time of the environment.

deletedDateTime.description: The deletion date and time of the environment.

dataverseId.description: The value of dataverseId property on the environment object.

domainName.description: The domain name of the environment.

adminMode.description: The administrative mode of the environment.

backgroundOperationsState.description: The background operations state of the environment.

protectionLevel.description: The protection level of the environment.

retentionDetails.description: The retention details of the environment.

retentionPeriod.description: The retention period of the environment.

availableFromDateTime.description: The available from date and time of the environment.

ValidationResponse.description: Represents the response for validation of an operation.

UserIdentity.description: Represents the identity of a user.

displayName.description: The display name of the user.

tenantId.description: The tenant ID of the user.

StateChangeRequest.description: Represents a request to change the state of an environment.

reason.description: The reason of this state change.

StageStatus.description: The stage status of an operation.

OperationExecutionResult.description: Represents the result of an operation execution.

startTime.description: The start time of the operation.

endTime.description: The end time of the operation.

stageStatuses.description: The list of State statuses associated with the operation.

ModifyEnvironmentSkuRequest.description: Represents request to change the sku of an environment.

ForceFailoverRequest.description: Request model for force failover operation on an environment.

lastSyncTime.description: Last sync time used for the force failover operation.

ErrorInfo.description: Represents error information for an operation.

EnvironmentRestoreRequest.description: Request model for restoring an environment to a previous backup.

restorePointDateTime.description: Restore point date-time with timezone offset per RFC 3339.

skipAuditData.description: A value indicating whether to skip audit data during the restore process.

sourceEnvironmentId.description: The ID of the source environment from which the backup will be restored from.

backupPointDateTime.description: The backup point date time. Set when backup is created.

label.description: The label for the manually created backup.

backupExpiryDateTime.description: Backup expiry date time based on retention period in days.

id.description: Environment backup ID. Auto-generated GUID if null.

dataverseOrganizationUrl.description: Dataverse organization Url of the environment.

CreateBackupRequest.description: Request model for creating a backup.

label.description: The label for the manually created backup.

CopyType.description: Represents the type of copy operation.

environmentNameToOverride.description: Environment name to override on target environment.

securityGroupIdToOverride.description: Security group ID to override on target environment.

skipAuditData.description: Boolean flag to skip audit data for copy.

executeAdvancedCopyForFinanceAndOperatio.description: Boolean flag to execute advanced copy for Finance and Operation data.

CopyRequest.description: Represents request to copy to a target environment from source environment.

sourceEnvironmentId.description: Source environment ID to copy from.
